content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here's a possible implementation of the `extract_julia_code` function:
```
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = []
    for block in md.children
        if block.name == "code"
            code_blocks.append(block.value)
        end
    end
    return "\n".join(code_blocks)
end
```
This function first iterates over all the children of the `md` object, checking if each child has a name equal to "code". If it does, it appends the value of the block (i.e., the code itself) to an array called `code_blocks`. Finally, it joins all the code blocks together with newline characters and returns the resulting string.

Note that this function assumes that the input `md` object is a Markdown document with Julia language code blocks. If the input is not in the correct format, the function may produce incorrect results or raise an error.
